import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; export const AddProducts = () => { return (

ADD PRODUCTS

onSubmit(e)}> setProductName(e.target.value)} value={productName}/> setProductPrice(e.target.value)} value={productPrice}/> setProductDescription(e.target.value)} value={productDescription}/>
) } export default AddProducts
